title: Strengthening Deep Learning Practical Competencies: Mathematical Thinking Training for Converting Linguistic Expressions into Graphs

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can convert linguistic problem situations into graphical representations following a four-step procedure (interpretation → preliminary adjustment → graph construction → equivalence verification).
Learners can select graph representation strategies based on numerical/algebraic characteristics according to situational needs.
Learners can explicitly explain their problem-solving processes using think-aloud protocols.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
